column1: The '''King's Writers''' were the royal scribes of [[Gondor]]. This entailed making the official records of Gondor

column2: a King's Writer of renown presumably under the Kingship of [[Eldarion]]<ref>The year of Eldarion's death is not recorded
column3: but he would have been at most 171 years old and reigned 52 years when Findegil appears in the records.</ref> in the [[Fourth Age]]
column4: is known to have made at least one copy of the [[Red Book of Westmarch]] in [[Minas Tirith]]. Indeed
column6: he finished a copy to create the [[Thain's Book]].<ref>{{FR|Records}}</ref>
